title: Meghan Markle Claims Victory in Battle Against British Tabloid
sub_head: Ms. Markle sued the Mail Online and the Mail on Sunday over publication of a letter the former actress sent to her father
body:
LONDONâ€”Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex and wife of Prince Harry, claimed victory Thursday in her legal battle against a British tabloid that published a letter the former actress sent to her father.
The judgment is the latest episode in an often fraught relationship between the British press and Prince Harry and Ms. Markle, as they seek to recast their image after breaking away from the British royal family.
